article_title: Ernst Discusses Managed Healthcare and Other Issues – Mix 107.3 KIOW
article_text:
The issue regarding Obamacare has begun to hit small businesses hard, in some cases causing financial hardship or loss of employees. Start up businesses are also having issues regarding the program which has generated a number of complaints and objections leveled at Congress. Senator Joni Ernst has been receiving a number of these and spoke out recently on these and other issues.

What is Congress doing about the small business vs. Obamacare mandates crisis facing America, especially those here in northern Iowa?

You have been a champion of regaining the rights of WASP’s, women air force pilots in WWII, to be buried in Arlington National Cemetery. The military did an about face recently and started to deny these women the honor of burial there. You have taken up a cause to reverse that order in Congress. Where does this stand right now?

og.title: SUNDAY TALK: Ernst Discusses Managed Healthcare and Other Issues

article_summary:
The issue regarding Obamacare has begun to hit small businesses hard, in some cases causing financial hardship or loss of employees.
Senator Joni Ernst has been receiving a number of these and spoke out recently on these and other issues.
You have been a champion of regaining the rights of WASP’s, women air force pilots in WWII, to be buried in Arlington National Cemetery.
Start up businesses are also having issues regarding the program which has generated a number of complaints and objections leveled at Congress.
What is Congress doing about the small business vs. Obamacare mandates crisis facing America, especially those here in northern Iowa?
